boat.full_description:
Hull believed to be a Canadian design with 3 keels and a Bermudan rig. The Builder of the hull is unknown. Frank Graves fitted out the cabin and gave her a gaff rig and engine in early 1970's at Paglesham. Twin keels were removed in 1979, a topmast added and bowsprit lengthened.

13/3/2015 - In need of a re-build.

Due to illness the owner was not able to rebuild, and local pressure from the Panglesham Village Trust led to her breakup in 2019. The mast is to be re-used as the mizzen mast for the lugger Lyonesse of Mousehole.
boat.name: Francesca
